pkgmetadata.longdescription: Corbae-Ouliaris Frequency Domain Filtering // Corbae-Ouliaris frequency domain filtering. According to Corbae and Ouliaris (2006) doi:10.1017/CBO9781139164863.008, this is a solution for taking into account characteristics of the time series, like business cycles etc. when filtering, both stationary and non- stationary time series.
